title: Hot Springs National Park: Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Research              Research         Bandstand above Grand Promenade, 1901 National Park Service image from HOSP archives  Provided here are just a few of the many research papers and hand-outs that have been created by park staff on various topics over the years. You will need the free Adobe Acrobat Reader to read them.  Â    -- African Americans and the Hot Springs Baths -- American Indians at Hot Springs National Park -- The Forgotten Expedition of Dunbar and Hunter -- The Oertel System of Graduated Exercise -- The Remarkable Therapy Machines of Dr. Gustav Zander
